name: [Brain Bonk] Space Chaos
description:
A 2D side scroller shmup where you fly through an asteroid field and defeat the baddies*

This game was created as part of a team assignment for University. "Brain Bonk" refers to the team behind the game. 

Here's a link to the github if you'd like to tinker with it: https://github.com/Meow/spacegame

*the baddies aren't actually that bad.
